DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Open-Label , Crossover , Multicenter , Single Dose Comparator Study Evaluating Onset Of Penile Rigidity In Men With Erectile Dysfunction Who Are Treated With Sildenafil And Tadalafil
DOC.criteria: Included subject 18 year age old A clinical diagnosis erectile dysfunction Known responder either 100 mg sildenafil 20 mg tadalafil . Excluded subject unable achieve penile rigidity great equal 20 % base penis sustain least 3 minute Subjects able achieve penile rigidity great equal 60 % base penis sustain least 2 minute subject able achieve penile rigidity great equal 80 % base penis sustain least 1 minute measure Rigiscan® , screen therapy , within 60 minute follow visual sexual stimulation Subjects currently use commercially available treatment erectile dysfunction Subjects nitrate .
